io.jeo.vector

Class FeatureCursor

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.jeo.data.Cursor<Feature>
      • io.jeo.vector.FeatureCursor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Iterable<Feature>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CSVCursor, FeatureWriteCursor, GeobufCursor, GeoJSONCursor, GeoPkgFeatureCursor, MemFeatureCursor, MongoCursor, OGRCursor, PostGISCursor

    public abstract class FeatureCursor
extends Cursor<Feature>
    Extension of Cursor for Feature objects.

      • empty

        public static FeatureCursor empty()
        Returns an empty feature cursor.

      • reproject

        public FeatureCursor reproject(org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem crs)
        Reprojects features in the stream to a specified coordinate reference system.

        This method determines the source crs from objects in the underlying cursor. Use reproject(org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem, org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem) to explicitly specify the source crs.

        Parameters:
        crs - The crs to reproject to.
        Returns:
        The wrapped cursor.

      • reproject

        public FeatureCursor reproject(org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem from,
                      org.osgeo.proj4j.CoordinateReferenceSystem to)
        Reprojects features in the cursor between two specified coordinate reference systems.
        Parameters:
        from - The source crs.
        to - The destination crs.
        Returns:
        The wrapped cursor.

        Returns:

      • buffer

        public FeatureCursor buffer(int n)
        Description copied from class: Cursor
        Returns a cursor capable of being Cursor.rewind() within a certain number of objects.

        The n parameter specifies the buffer size. Up to n objects can be read from the cursor before calling Cursor.rewind(). After n objects have been read the cursor stops buffering and delegates to the original cursor.

        Overrides:
        buffer in class Cursor<Feature>
        Parameters:
        n - The buffer size.

      • wrap

        public static <T extends Feature> FeatureCursor wrap(Cursor<Feature> cursor)
        Wraps a cursor of Feature as a FeatureCursor, if it is not an instance already.
